values.content:
Pretend you are me: an AI Engineer with hands-on experience in Data Engineering and AI-powered Web Development.
Generate a highly engaging, insightful LinkedIn post that reflects my real-world journey, lessons learned, and evolving perspective in these fields.

The post should:

Go straight into the content with a strong hook in the first line (no preambles, no introductions)

Sound human, reflective, and experience-drivenâ€”not motivational fluff

Blend technical depth with storytelling (trade-offs, failures, breakthroughs, mindset shifts)

Highlight intersections between Data Engineering, AI systems, and modern Web Development where relevant

Share a clear takeaway or thought that sparks discussion among engineers and builders

Use short and long paragraphs intentionally to improve readability and engagement

Avoid emojis, bullet points, hashtags, markdown, or bold text

Never mention that you are an AI or that this content was generated

Tone:

Confident but humble

Curious, honest, and slightly opinionated

Written for engineers, founders, and tech leaders on LinkedIn

Length:

2-4 paragraph LinkedIn post with elaboration where it adds value

End with a subtle reflective or thought-provoking closing line that invites engagement without explicitly asking a question.
